ffmpeg._comment_ffmpeg: FFmpeg settings for subtitle rendering. 'crf' controls video quality (0-51, lower is better). 'preset' affects encoding speed (e.g., ultrafast, fast, medium, slow).

models._comment_source_lang: Source language for transcription. Set to 'auto' for auto-detection or use 'en','jp' (e.g., 'de'). See https://huggingface.co/openai/whisper-large-v3 for 99 supported languages.
models._comment_whisper_model: Whisper model for transcription: tiny, base, small, medium, large-v3, large-v3-turbo. Larger models are more accurate but slower.
models._comment_translation_model: Translation model: 'facebook/nllb-200-1.3B' (accurate) or 'facebook/nllb-200-distilled-600M' (faster). Supports 196 languages, see https://huggingface.co/facebook/nllb-200-1.3B.
models._comment_target_lang: Target language for translation in NLLB format (e.g., 'tur_Latn', 'eng_Latn', 'jpn_Jpan'). Do NOT use short codes like 'tr', 'en'.

language_code_map._comment_language_code_map: Maps short language codes to NLLB format. Add more languages as needed.

logging._comment_log_file: Name of the unified log file for all pipeline steps.

subtitles._comment_mode: Subtitle type: 'soft' (embedded, toggleable) or 'burned' (hardcoded into video).
subtitles._comment_max_line_length: Maximum characters per subtitle line for readability.
subtitles._comment_max_lines: Maximum number of subtitle lines displayed at once.

audio_extraction._comment_use_ffmpeg: Use FFmpeg instead of MoviePy for audio extraction (faster with hwaccel).

whisper_transcription._comment_beam_size: Number of beams for beam search. Higher values increase accuracy but slow down transcription.
whisper_transcription._comment_vad_filter: Enable Voice Activity Detection to filter silence.
whisper_transcription._comment_word_timestamps: Include word-level timestamps in transcription output.
whisper_transcription._comment_min_silence_duration_ms: Minimum silence duration (ms) for VAD filter.
whisper_transcription._comment_max_initial_timestamp: Maximum initial timestamp (seconds) for transcription start.
